ruleContent.content:
<js>
if(!cache.get("ua2")){   
	h=JSON.parse(java.ajax("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/microlinkhq/top-user-agents/master/src/desktop.json"))
java.log(h.length)
x =Math.floor(Math.random() *h.length)
java.log(h[x])	
cache.put("ua2", h[x],86400);
    	}
//!(/google.cn/).test(baseUrl)?h=java.getString("id.acontent@html"):h=decodeURIComponent(baseUrl.replace(/^.*?text=/, ''));
url = baseUrl.replace("www.bilinovel.com","tw.linovelib.com")
//re = java.ajax(baseUrl)
//re = java.ajax(url)
//h = java.webView(null,url,null);
//java.setContent(re); 
h = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
//java.log(h)
java.setContent(h)

h=java.getElements("tag.body@tag.div.5@children").not("[data-ad-client]").not("script")//Clear ads
//END
if(0){//jump old codes

original_list = java.getElements("tag.body@tag.div.5@children")

java.setContent(h)
h = java.getElements("tag.body@tag.div.5@children");
//java.log(h[4])
//java.log(h.length)
if(h.length!=original_list.length){//there is repeat item
	

//replace to correct text
function confident(str1, str2){
	if(str1.length!=str2.length){
		return false; 
		}
		if(str1.length==0){
			return true;
			}
		confidence =0;
		target = Math.max(1,Math.floor(str1.length/2));
	for(let i=0;i<str1.length;i++){
		if(str1[i]==str2[i]){
			confidence++;
			if(confidence>=target){
				return true;
				}
			}
		}
		return false;
	}
k=0
for(let i=0;i<original_list.length;i++){
if(k>=h.length){
break;
}
ele = original_list[i]
str = String(java.getString("text",ele));
strcom = String(java.getString("text",h[k]));
java.log(str)
java.log(strcom)
//java.log(str.length)
//java.log(strcom.length)
while(k<h.length&&!confident(str,strcom)){
k++
strcom = String(java.getString("text",h[k]));
java.log("x")
java.log(strcom)
//java.log(strcom.length)
}

if(k<h.length){
if(java.getString("tag.script@all",ele)!= ""){
original_list[i] = h[0]
}else{
original_list[i] = h[k]
}
}

k++
}
h = original_list
}//close repeat item
else
{
	h = java.getString("tag.body@tag.div.5@html")
	}
//run readtools.js match words
//run js file's last line
//jsLink = java.getString("tag.script@src").match(new RegExp("https.+readtools.+", "gi"))[0];
//h=String(h);
//code = String(java.ajax(jsLink)).trim().split("\n").pop().trim().split(";")[1];
}//end of old code
h
</js>

if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { eval(String(source.loginUrl)); var img_size = '0'; imglist=JSON.parse(result).data.imagesByChapterId; if (cache.get(Get('url') + "authorization") && ImageLimit() !== 'undefined') { ImageLimit(); if (json.limit - json.usage < img_size && source.getLoginInfoMap()["Ë¥¶Âè∑Ôºö"].includes(",")) { Login(); } if (json.limit - json.usage < 50 && !source.getLoginInfoMap()["Ë¥¶Âè∑Ôºö"].includes(",")) { Login(); } } comicId = baseUrl.substring(baseUrl.indexOf('comic/') + 6, baseUrl.lastIndexOf('/chapter')); chapterId = baseUrl.substring(baseUrl.indexOf('chapter/') + 8, baseUrl.lastIndexOf('/images')); option = '{"body":{"operationName":"addReadComicHistory","variables":{"comicId":"' + comicId + '","chapterId":"' + chapterId + '","page":1},"query":"mutation addReadComicHistory($comicId: ID!, $chapterId: ID!, $page: Int!) {\n addReadComicHistory(comicId: $comicId, chapterId: $chapterId, page: $page) {\n id\n comicId\n chapters {\n id\n chapterId\n page\n __typename\n }\n startDate\n lastDate\n chapterType\n __typename\n }\n}"},"headers":{"authorization":"' + cache.get(Get('url') + 'authorization') + '","Content-Type":"application/json"},"method": "POST"}'; url = Get('url') + '/api/query,' + option; java.ajax(url); var result=''; for(i in imglist){ result +='\n' } } else { '
'; }

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
function explore(a, b, c, d, e) {
  style = "{title: \"" + a + "\",url: \"" + b + "\",style: {layout_flexGrow:" + c + ",layout_flexBasisPercent:" + d + ",layout_wrapBefore: " + e + "}}";
  return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = ["Êú¨Êó•ÊéíË°å", "Êú¨Âë®ÊéíË°å", "Êú¨ÊúàÊéíË°å"];
type = ["tt=H24&ct=VC", "tt=D7&ct=VC", "tt=D30&ct=VC"];
for (i in title) {
  var pathname = "comics/leaderboard?" + type[i];
  var method = "GET";
  var signature = getsignature(pathname, setTime, method);
  var headers = getheaders(setTime, nonce, signature).replace(/\"/g, '\\\"');
  var url = "https://api.manhuapica.com/" + pathname + ",{\\\"method\\\":\\\"GET\\\",\\\"headers\\\":{" + headers + "}}";
  exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 0x1, 0.25, ![]));
}
exploreUrl.splice(0x0, 0x0, explore("‡º∫Àá¬ª` ö „ÄÄ  ‚ú®ÊéíË°åÊ¶ú‚ú®  „ÄÄ …û¬¥¬´Àá‡ºª", '', 0x1, 0x1, ![]));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.slice(0, 4).join(',') + ']';
exploreUrlStr;</js>

var pathname = "comics/" + '@get:{id}' + "/eps?page=1";
var method = "GET";

var headers = getheaders(setTime, nonce, signature);
end = "https://api.manhuapica.com/" + pathname + ",{\"method\":\"GET\",\"headers\":{" + headers + "}}";
end;
</js>

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var pathname = "comics/" + '@get:{id}' + "/eps?page=1";
var method = "GET";
var signature = getsignature(pathname, setTime, method);
var headers = getheaders(setTime, nonce, signature);
end = "https://api.manhuapica.com/" + pathname + ",{\"method\":\"GET\",\"headers\":{" + headers + "}}";
end;
</js>
ruleSearch.name: title

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
(function searchComicList(searchKeys) {
    var pathname = "comics/advanced-search?page=" + page + "&s=dd";
    var method = "POST";
    var body = "\{\"keyword\":\"" + searchKeys + "\",\"sort\":\"dd\"\}";
    var signature = getsignature(pathname, setTime, method);
    var headers = getheaders(setTime, nonce, signature);
    end = "https://api.manhuapica.com/" + pathname + ",{\"method\":\"POST\",\"headers\":{" + headers + "},\"body\":'" + body + "'}";
    return end;
}(key));
</js>
